advisories.description: Multiple issues were addressed by updating to git version 2.32.3.

cves.credit: Carlo Marcelo Arenas Belón and Johannes Schindelin

advisories.impact: Cloning a malicious repository may result in the disclosure of sensitive information
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: A remote user may cause an unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution if git shell is allowed as a login shell
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Kevin Backhouse of the GitHub Security Lab

advisories.impact: An app may be able to gain root privileges
advisories.description: An injection issue was addressed with improved input validation.
